text: Kiss Rocks Vegas is a live album and DVD/Blu-ray Disc by the American hard rock band Kiss released on August 26, 2016. The album was recorded from November 5–23, 2014 during the band's residency at the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, during their 40th anniversary tour. Kiss Rocks Vegas was released in cinemas worldwide on May 25, 2016, and later released on pay-per-view on June 14, 2016. ==Track listing== ===Live album=== ===DVD/Blu- ray=== Kiss Rocks Vegas Kiss Acoustic ==Personnel== *Paul Stanley – vocals, rhythm guitar *Gene Simmons – vocals, bass *Tommy Thayer – lead guitar, vocals *Eric Singer – drums, vocals ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Australian Music DVD (Aria Top 40) | 1 |- |- !Austrian Music DVD !2 |- |- ! scope="row"| Belgian Music DVD (Ultratop Flanders) | 1 |- ! scope="row"| Dutch Music DVD (Dutch Charts) | 1 |- ! scope="row"| Finnish Music DVD (Finland Charts) | 1 |- ! scope="row"| France Music DVD | 2 |- |- ! scope="row"| German Music DVD (German Charts) ! 1 |- ! scope="row"| Sweden Hard Rock Album Charts | 12 |- ! scope="row"| Sweden Music DVD Charts | 1 |- |- !Swiss Music DVD !1 |- !Spain Music DVD !1 |- ! scope="row"| UK Official Top 50 DVD (British Charts) | 1 |- !US Billboard Music DVD Charts !1 |- |} ==References== Category:Kiss (band) compilation albums Category:2016 compilation albums Category:2016 live albums Category:Kiss (band) live albums Category:Albums recorded at the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino (Las Vegas) Category:Hard Rock Hotel and Casino (Las Vegas)
